title: TahMc Ent/Rockaholic Hangover Drink Present Tah Mac Live @ Theatre
desc: TahMc Entertainment & Rockaholic Hangover Drink Presents Tah Mac live @ The Globe Theater in Los Angeles. Tah Mac the hip-pop artist/producer will be performing his live energetic show with full band, the Gold selling artist hailing from Brooklyn N.Y. Has found success thruout the years with some of his current smash hit singles "Oxygen" feat hip hop legend Redman and Africa's own Ice Prince as well as his edm produced single by David Guetta "Tripping" feat LP. Come out and witness this dynamic performer and hear cuts from his new EP titled "The Remedy"
